Reviews.Title: “Great Stuff, don't hesitate”
Reviews.Author: bollingerbetty
Reviews.Content: hotel extremely central location tube station quick links rer proper view arc de triomphe hotel unlike claim near arc de triomphe actually miles decor edgy querky sacrifice function standard paris standards mirror ceiling definitely talking unlike site bathroom fine loo separate rest bathroom proper door bathroom laid curtain bedroom fantastic shower monsoon shower head foot square water pressure worth staff helpful welcome warm friendly local bars restaurants offer choice eat drink course paris hotel breakfast unlike info reviewers buffet style efficient im paris soon definitely return

Reviews.Title: “What An Experience!!!!”
Reviews.Author: maryish81
Reviews.Content: mac mahon conveniently located block champs elysees metro 500 feet staff extremely helpful friendly arrived wasnt exactly moved immediately question extra charge larger shower lovely view top arc de triumphe european lodging usually tight sufficient space price location space unbeatable definitely visiting paris

Reviews.Title: “GREAT ATMOSPHERE”
Reviews.Author: hunderd
Reviews.Content: beautiful stay 1 min walk arc de triomphe champs elysees metro station warm homey atmosphere impressed service receptionists especially mia feel home smile amazing attitude help nicely designed mirrors fantastic bad parking definitely doubt

Reviews.Title: “valentine honeymoon”
Reviews.Author: aimie s
Reviews.Content: husband 2 night stay wedding gift input choice hotel opted stay greeted 2 friendly hotel staff met spoke perfect english helped nightmare journey tip 55 euros taxi airport worth penny train horrible ages taxi station anyway finding honeymoon immediately upgraded amazing view arc de triomphe spacious flawlessly clean beautifully decorated comfy bed ive slept youre able book top bus tickets hotel reception short walk champs elysees bus picks worth doing easiest paris short time absolutely stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Elegant interior”
Reviews.Author: CoolPilot
Reviews.Content: elegant beautiful hotel total renovation design napoleon historical french style – breakfast hotel option restaurant opposite street free choose café lot nearest streets fresh croissant coffee morning personal friendly glad help book taxi tickets opera passed 3 days paris wifi free lobby

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel. Modern Design. Fantastic Staff”
Reviews.Author: asbedi
Reviews.Content: stones throw arc de triomphe stop 1 line metro hotel ideally located close action quiet relaxed proximity metro station makes entire city accessible hotel recently modern amenities modern layout helpful cordial staff makes entire stay pleasure compared hotels considered fantastic value money received

Reviews.Title: “Gem of a hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alan H
Reviews.Content: hotel amazing renovation complete outstanding price pay especially paris welcome recieve staff hotel quality 4 night stay hotel ideally located arc de triomphe 200m metro rer close easy explore fantastic city highly reccomend hotel definetly stay hotel visit alan

Reviews.Title: “Quaint Paris”
Reviews.Author: hsmithjr
Reviews.Content: nice expected parisian hotel service excellent rates wont break bank quaint balcony view arc sleep patio doors city smells sounds location close subway champs fine restaurants recommended highly

Reviews.Title: “Mac Mahon-great place”
Reviews.Author: Pavlova-London
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel mac mahon birthday 2611 booked standard upgrade suitethe hotel lobby renovation everithing brand furniture fittings qualitythe location perfect paristhe staff friendly speaks time paris mac mahon unforgettable experiencethe property deserves stari hospitality industry london definitely coming therei strongly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Just renovated!”
Reviews.Author: micaengel
Reviews.Content: hotel renovated standart dont pay attention reviews november 2011 dont describe hotel putting stayed mac mahon weekend break partner loved reception hotel facilities bedroom amazing confortable funky extremelly clean flat screen tv ipod dock lovely decor including sexy ceiling mirror bathroom nice spa shower close metro champs ive checked hotel pictures bookingcom highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “in development”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a hotelsgrandparis.com traveler
Reviews.Content: altough hotel construction lobby floors plus services operational kitchen pleasant stay am redecoration finished hotel live standards surrounding neighborhood location fantastic couple meters arc clean bed comforable bathroom oustanding staff friendly english spoken recomand hotel rate 8 10
